title: RV32IMCK Processor Design
description: Design and implement a RV32IMCK Processor in SystemVerilog or Verilog.

scoring_details.functionality_description: The design must correctly execute all validator-side functional tests, covering diverse instruction sequences. Functionality score should be atleast 80% otherwise overall score would be set to zero.
scoring_details.area_baseline_gates: area target is 200000.0 micro square meter
scoring_details.power_budget_mw: To be introduced in future challenges
